descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 20 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
Get closer to the **Premier League** like never before with Premier League Player, the first-ever officially licensed VR Football (Soccer) game.

**Featuring all 20 Premier League teams**, authentic stadiums, and official kits.
[media]

# Moments
Step into the action with **Moments mode**, where you can replay highlights from the 2023/24 season. Become a hero for the club you support by scoring game-winning goals, delivering pinpoint assists, and feeling the intensity of every moment as if you were on the field.
[media]

# Shot Stopper
As the last line of defence, test your reflexes as a Premier League goalkeeper in our **Shot Stopper mode**.
[media]

# Headers
Rise above the competition in our **Heading mode**, perfecting the art of accuracy and timing. Jump in solo or with friends in head-to-head or coop mode.
[media]

# Free Play
Experience **Freeplay mode**, solo or with friends in local party mode, and sharpen your abilities with tailored Training Drills.
[media]

# The Sanctuary
Explore the **Player Sanctuary** to unlock and organise players, make the space your own, and then show off with your friends. Collect achievements and celebrate your journey to becoming a **Premier League Player**.
[media]

[media]

**Featuring all 20 Premier League teams**, authentic stadiums, and official kits.

# Moments
Step into the action with **Moments mode**, where you can replay highlights from the 2023/24 season. Become a hero for the club you support by scoring game-winning goals, delivering pinpoint assists, and feeling the intensity of every moment as if you were on the field.
![{"height":548,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38982608_496177003457260_5560369165376348648_n.mp4?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=6OoEyOySqh0Q7kNvgHPFn0W&_nc_oc=AdgDZc2G92hc_QTKxUc18h9vVEq1IK9yQ55AEZ0UqDmPbDtLowu2BDWiP238q5PDX2E&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=jnZNw8Jf1au7gkCsaHbN0w&oh=00_AYEMCGZ6_VzX8dfjIHooFr4D1djUk9HapYaB_3yJQDXujA&oe=67DA4286)

# Shot Stopper
As the last line of defence, test your reflexes as a Premier League goalkeeper in our **Shot Stopper mode**.
![{"height":500,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/65396053_1115537910290587_7889049024765379964_n.mp4?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=QKXY4-62KYcQ7kNvgFX8KDl&_nc_oc=AdgN2lppnirTiHV9_-ggsDDoKkyNng3ovCOTyw2LqmEj8Qwjuyllw1SkD4Py08EoOiE&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=jnZNw8Jf1au7gkCsaHbN0w&oh=00_AYHydJqnK4TRG9_ECFn8Ipu0U3K_t_2qRhM6opEAgO4u8g&oe=67DA2DC1)

# Headers
Rise above the competition in our **Heading mode**, perfecting the art of accuracy and timing. Jump in solo or with friends in head-to-head or coop mode.

# Free Play
Experience **Freeplay mode**, solo or with friends in local party mode, and sharpen your abilities with tailored Training Drills.
![{"height":548,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39003251_1279307779874373_9040994212728936058_n.mp4?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=vi3uzJwlnpcQ7kNvgFuYJeF&_nc_oc=AdiHty_akPg8mlkmu7QrwI0GuG8uxSyxQKKXlXtDSWyOEAm-g2agbr7iE6k5A_mvhB4&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=jnZNw8Jf1au7gkCsaHbN0w&oh=00_AYHYZEEVUAnnI2iE2RTIusJ-FRcm1Ghp6teiElwhl1u1hg&oe=67DA603A)

# The Sanctuary
Explore the **Player Sanctuary** to unlock and organise players, make the space your own, and then show off with your friends. Collect achievements and celebrate your journey to becoming a **Premier League Player**.
